feed.title: Prowlarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Prowlarr: 1.27.0.4852
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Prowlarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • b8b32f8708be0fbe988a7ede6117fe0c0572282b Fixed: (ImmortalSeed) Update relogin check
  • 30c4bb24e89c1a02ccf120eac14491e00b96fdd7 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • b447db5d08f9fa0127570375efdee4478bbaee97 Fixed: (RED) Update indexer url (#2285)
  • 299001a513589f6da1575473a904bd397993aad7 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 2871f1f2a29bb40fe5cda21e730c937259315cc2 Bump version to 1.27.0

This list of changes was auto generated.

entry.title: New release for Prowlarr: 1.28.2.4885

To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Prowlarr within an existing docker container.

See More * f3328863e18f3942a923f52b9143fdca9e199cb6 Fixed: (M-Team) IMDb removed from releases response * a23d792781e813293cf3c0960d70c0be9f8021d0 Fixed: Syncing Newznab indexers with expired VIP expiration dates to apps * f066cf399d7bddd5b0c14e74b563c4cde98f0e77 Fixed: Link to TMDb shows in search history [ #2294 ] * 61e863cb3163137c4209ff3e3082ca74494b0a7f Automated API Docs update * b2afbc687246d539449bf17c52290c6d62b9d7ac New: Add config file setting for CGNAT authentication bypass * aace65f88e58fd4520600003ae9c74fc5ca1daad Allow `GetFileSize` to follow symlinks * 9ab2d8b444c5e90e7e7b08b1bd1c2ac205725062 Bump IPAddressRange, Npgsql and Polly * bc314061ef2632a2762ac1c486c80b211e7af477 Fixed: Prevent lack of internet from stopping all health checks from running * 87b3dcd78048aef2610f3f82f7a21adcf73f4ade Support Postgres with non-standard version string * f3b99f68f694e2632f4adac77d63bbf0c879a59a Remove unnecessary heap allocations in local IP check * c4a90e8ba4a9b4e58b0d651c3e06cb8fe3686e8c Webpack web target * 41320ca2dcf2c022b67fdcc9efe271917b7b6b68 Bump version to 1.28.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Prowlarr/a958e221-aeac-4b0e-a862-d8ffe1df4b09/_release?releaseId=160&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Prowlarr: 1.29.2.4915
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Prowlarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 73494c462cf7039403af19a03f9d7dc546c932e6 Fixed: Listening on all IPv4 Addresses
  • 36f6896f30abfa54e36d226ddf3e1540fb1236b8 Fixed: (PassThePopcorn) Increase rate limit
  • e01741a69e2b1291839c99c5811931ce45a4d5dd New: (AnimeBytes) Use error message from response
  • 1dbff1235e0bc2e250e0fbb8fd5fb7d5e1e476ec Match single digits only in season number regex for AnimeBytes
  • 1a9ad6b363e50e02989e99382089e056a423554c Suggest adding IP to RPC whitelist for on failed Transmission auth
  • c88249300c36b232fc2bf93571c7777378dd874d Check if backup folder is writable on backup
  • 7b8e352d876cd8f8e5b6296f0c3938bed4db8bb8 Bump SonarCloud azure extension to 3.X
  • 81f7a6cbab0b2bc3502377e7d00a421317677131 Word boundary in season number regex for AnimeBytes
  • 523e46af2a35b127d7253d44b7b613fcdebb3d1f Fixed: (AnimeBytes) Include year in release title for series with year in filenames
  • 2b4a6def2aa45b9a478a09d2fb00ffd5f442c5dc Fixed privacy level for Nebulance's API key
See More * 9097c0ef6d7b03a24a0294d6eaffdc6b3988b94b Bump version to 1.29.2 * 4321c1d40ce64358b82a90bb46c29c8a272a2630 Catch search engine related error messages for MyAnonaMouse * bb2548a08d5b36ad520a59f6cb957762a646a54e Don't send session information to Sentry * 3a9b841fad457320b77528cb841940ec5f13bf62 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 31203d1370a9b61c99c9e3d7fa8e1764bdf0fb09 Add more links for info FlareSolverr and category 8000 * c8a910eaf429509071f9a75b7b1c414594d6011a Fixed: (RuTracker) Update categories * 9ab3c3e6c734092976bd746132efe7b09aa5c949 Update how to get cookies info for Cardigann * 4659cb706add2e79b1c60652e4da69be9d24bca7 Fixed: (Knaben) Update base url * 500759bf1f1312051af6e9f603e62424536dcef6 Bump version to 1.29.1 * 43c7c4325755fe8f1dd3f475153b1ca7becbcbd3 Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient to 2.1.7 * 9c2fced391016577903fcbc8070705d36110dc13 Bump System.Text.Json to 6.0.10 * 52ec5b6ff6d96772928a5268d5d58cf35472b8ac Bump MailKit to 4.8.0 * b46e6579767dfbb9efc94059ec8bd112266219ea Fixed: (NorBits) Searching UTF-8 characters with full search disabled (#2305) * 51fd30ba10a40420d95f80b001c0b273a7b5432d Use message from error response for Gazelle indexers * 5fbb3471087376ea965a6b881bb705f01b77e3a1 Upgrade typescript-eslint packages to 8.181.1 * 54d3d446208c6fda2304d1111c79663c7da91be8 Upgrade Font Awesome to 6.7.1 * 5ca18683ca59e36f7c4c3af5c7e1ecb937fb2552 Upgrade babel to 7.26.0 * 6bdf5f5d6916b03a4dbef001bdf1da8fdd074530 Use error message from Redacted response * 7cba7152f17e795f51a61ff0e3d9afdd69ce94ad Bump version to 1.29.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Prowlarr/a958e221-aeac-4b0e-a862-d8ffe1df4b09/_release?releaseId=164&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Prowlarr: 1.30.2.4939
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Prowlarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 1f7ac7d7d608959126b2ec5441638ed37ebb48e3 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 8ac68240adf67acb0fee53abe168e4ad57a30f6f Revert "Improve error message on non-JSON responses for Nebulance"
  • b463a3f54be2416ef88831364d02cd298573dcfc Update categories for RuTracker
  • e15e57329e1b2449ed25cbf0bc91bdd666ea5fbc Update categories for XSpeeds
  • d8354408a4ef98d271cecdf5e0c5fc65cc9b5255 Update categories for AnimeTorrents
  • 6d2d49f7bd1c3a30a4b5b1e192ab323426b819bc Fixed: (PTP) Filtering non-freeleech releases when using Freeleech Only
  • 37610eec4069720e55c5783b67630eba1ea887f5 Fixed: (TorrentDay) Improved error message for expired cookies
  • ed5120811677961e273c7ad81eb79e70a02f3083 Auto-detect building on macOS ARM
  • 26e4dcad655138e5c456532a7a75b4dd6d9a0de5 Bump version to 1.30.2
  • 6eb21a02a1caff10e583b64bfaa6b3125be11eb2 Bump NLog, Polly, System.Memory and AngleSharp
See More * 8c2d5a404d4658d7252418c4a233244c08029b86 Fixed BR-DISK detection for AnimeBytes * 3b83a00eaff4c14ae0b64f7be825cb69db491eea Fixed: (AnimeBytes) Improve M2TS and ISO titles for BR-DISK detection * a5a86a6f865a707f19e1950827b3245bf65ebbfe Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * e7ed09a43d4171d52821dab1a883f97da883b48a Bump version to 1.30.1 * 547bc2e58c44ef9bdf62af7fbde4dea07f0c85c2 New: (MyAnonamouse) Search by languages option [ #2326 ] * 8eb674c8d793e478faa7aa2f3e755fbe0869a94b Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 2c3621d25e1f4e67abeed6fefa160f114e5096a3 Improve error message on non-JSON responses for Nebulance * 2648f2c639cbb4744b174b8abc82d9b2e142370e Fixed: (BTN) Improve M2TS and ISO titles for BR-DISK detection * f4d621063bf0bd9867fe24546843db34bb32f56f Bump version to 1.30.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Prowlarr/a958e221-aeac-4b0e-a862-d8ffe1df4b09/_release?releaseId=167&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Prowlarr: 1.31.2.4975
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Prowlarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 635e76526a38dd1c28d659c5a71f877e794ac700 Cleanse console log messages
  • 790feed5ab6b26ba25e50a6db81e0504e7823d17 Fixed: Fallback to Instance Name for Discord notifications
  • 59b5d2fc786f5a0fca37d1a191772522f17debcd Fixed: Drop downs flickering in some cases
  • d5b12cf51a7adf48d4ef5455014c61443a8a01ef Fixed release guid for SpeedApp
  • 2d584f7eb64eeddb292b60a7cf1cfbf433debc99 New: Support for exclusive indexer flag
  • 0f1d647cd7510bb48be01354aeea8edcf88b257d Fixed: (FileList) Download links when passkey contains spaces
  • d6e8d89be4daa73fb9d43bcd969622dc66d918e8 Fixed: (NorBits) Update release category parsing (#2342)
  • 8672129d5a98cac9b591535aa0a63ac64df2766e Fixed: (AnimeTorrents) Switched to cookies login
  • 44bdff8b8fdb2fbdb07788ee884650b71f53e378 Minor cleanup for AnimeTorrents
  • 4df8fc02f1720cac683bc747b244360f0cf2dc2b Bump version to 1.31.2
See More * e101129cff942dd7156657627347b6a00b1c1579 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 147e732c9ca7a4c289d4f6386f1277650e11f15b Building docs on ARM * a12381fb1d07ab81d8af4c0ed02aba5763bace52 Cleanse "rsskey" from logs * 3a4de9cca12f1c8432391cd151ca25c71c40c0f1 Fixed: (MAM) Continue downloading if attempting to buy personal FL for VIP release * 43c988d9514b360cd169fba20441bf8e6b375348 Fixed: (MAM) Use the latest cookies on release download * a036e0fc37e633176a2aef3c389bca81d8425ec6 Fixed: (MAM) Updated property name for user class * 56b9da16cfb67cf45b346e810097cd305c3e80f5 Fix release category selector on all themes for NorBits * 887c262589769e5408ee2dc4fd044d5d3c63ec9e Update release category selector for NorBits (#2338) * 12ff612775605de1b9fa33f62b89887819d08e82 Fixed: (NorBits) Added main categories to avoid invalid releases (#2337) * 0d3d27e46ff74bfc4ca244c254580f523fbdb900 Fixed: (HDB) Use release name for full discs and XXX content * d1846fde615f939a2bb41e2445a5aea6174997bc New: (Myanonamouse) Prevent downloads without FL tokens * e6901506a0fb1a9de0422bdeb8d6c43e631e303c Fixed: (IPTorrents) Cleanup languages between brackets when possible * 08b4eddbc53c8ae0a3025cfe41072031c44874c5 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 979db70e6851e1a3501394193722a97d2367d46a Bump version to 1.31.1 * 22834a852a4643b00fe98b7ee1550d129a03f710 Fixed: TV search with tmdbid for Newznab and Torznab * f0540a5f8b95a6fac68166947aeb6c07214870e7 Bump version to 1.31.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Prowlarr/a958e221-aeac-4b0e-a862-d8ffe1df4b09/_release?releaseId=172&_a=release-summary).
